Text:
Judge Dredd Megazine #324
     Judge Dredd - The Ajudicators (part 2 - final part) (Simon Spurrier - Carlos Ezquerra)
     Interview - Steve Pugh
     Samizdat Squad - Grey Zone (part 2) (Arthur Wyatt - P.J.Holden)
     Snapshot (part 3) (Andy Diggle - Jock)
     Judge Dredd - Scream Symphony (illustrated text story) (Alec Worley - Cam Smith)
     Hondo-City Justice - Project Behemoth (part 1) (Robbie Morrison - Mike Collins and Cliff Robinson)
     Graphic novel 50 - Tiger Sun, Dragon Moon (cover: Andy Clarke)
          Tiger Sun, Dragon Moon (reprint from 2000AD progs 1426-1432) (script/art: Steve Parkhouse)
          Harry Kipling (Deceased) - The Hitman and Hermoth (reprint from 2000AD progs 1509-1512) (Simon Spurrier - Boo Cook)

Judge Dredd Megazine #325
     Judge Dredd - Great Executions (part 1) (Robbie Morrison - Dave Taylor)
     Interview - Chris Weston (part 1)
     Samizdat Squad - Grey Zone (part 3) (Arthur Wyatt - P.J.Holden)
     Snapshot (part 4) (Andy Diggle - Jock)
     Interview - David Hine
     Judge Dredd - The Greater Good (illustrated text story) (Michael Carroll - Steve Dillon)
     Hondo-City Justice - Project Behemoth (part 2) (Robbie Morrison - Mike Collins and Cliff Robinson)
     Graphic novel 51 - American Gothic (art: Mike Collins)
          American Gothic (reprint from 2000AD progs 1432-1440) (Ian Edginton - Mike Collins)
          Tharg's Terror Tales - Scene of the Crime (reprint from 2000AD prog 1296) (Al Ewing - Dom Reardon)
          Tharg's Terror Tales - Keeping it Real (reprint from 2000AD prog 1386) (Al Ewing - Cam Smith)

Judge Dredd Megazine #326
     Judge Dredd - Great Executions (part 2) (Robbie Morrison - Dave Taylor)
     Interview - Chris Weston (part 2 - final part)
     Samizdat Squad - Grey Zone (part 4 - final part) (Arthur Wyatt - P.J.Holden)
     Interview - Chris Burnham
     Snapshot (part 5) (Andy Diggle - Jock)
     Feature - Countdown to Judgement (Dredd movie stills)
     Judge Dredd - The Pack (illustrated text story) (Alan Grant - Smudge)
     Hondo-City Justice - Project Behemoth (part 3 - final part) (Robbie Morrison - Mike Collins and Cliff Robinson)
     Graphic novel 52 - Bato Loco (art: Simon Coleby)
          Judge Dredd - Bato Loco (reprint from Judge Dredd Megazine 202) (Gordon Rennie - Simon Coleby)
          Bato Loco - True Romance (reprint from Judge Dredd Megazine 208) (Gordon Rennie - Simon Coleby)
          Bato Loco - Head Job (reprint from Judge Dredd Megazine 229-230) (Gordon Rennie - Simon Coleby)
          Bato Loco - Kiss Me Deadly (reprint from Judge Dredd Megazine 290-291) (Gordon Rennie - Andrew Currie)
          Judge Dredd - Meat Patrol (reprint from Judge Dredd Megazine 224) (Gordon Rennie - Simon Coleby)

Judge Dredd Megazine #327
     Judge Dredd - Great Executions (part 3 - final part) (Robbie Morrison - Dave Taylor)
     Interview - Dylan Teague
     Tales from the Black Museum - The Girl with the Gila Munja Tattoo (Alec Worley - David Roach)
     Snapshot (part 6) (Andy Diggle - Jock)
     Interview - Barry Kitson
     Judge Dredd - Paranoia (illustrated text story) (Alan Grant - Carlos Ezquerra)
     Judge Anderson - Stone Voices (part 1) (Alan Grant - Boo Cook)
     Graphic novel 44 - Venus Bluegenes - Venus on the Frag Shell
          Venus Bluegenes - Venus on the Frag Shell (reprint from 2000ad progs 976-979) (Dan Abnett - Simon Coleby)
          Venus Bluegenes - Stealth (reprint from 2000ad progs 980-982) (Steve White - Henry Flint)
          Tor Cyan - No Such Place (reprint from 2000ad progs 1297-1299) (John Tomlinson - Jock)

Judge Dredd Megazine #328
     Judge Dredd - Ratfink's Revenge (part 1) (Alan Grant - Tiernen Trevallion)
     Interview - Simon Coleby
     Judge Anderson - Stone Voices (part 2) (Alan Grant - Boo Cook)
     Interview - Karl Urban
     Snapshot (part 7) (Andy Diggle - Jock)
     Feature - The Art of Law (Jock's concept art for Dredd 3D)
     Dredd - Top of the World, Ma-Ma (a Dredd 3D movie prologue) (Matt Smith - Henry Flint) (splash page art: Greg Staples)
     Interview - Alex Garland

Thanks for these and the other Dredd torrents!
By any chance do you know where I can find issues 311-315 of the Megazine?
Thanks!
